name: SpotTheMatch
0:
”Alexa, open spot the match”
”Alexa, open spot the match and get my rank”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: spot the match
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Welcome to Spot The Match, the fast-paced game that tests your observation skills and reaction time! In this exciting game, players are immersed in a thrilling race against the clock, and each other, to spot matching icons from a series of cards.

How to Play:

Start the Game: Simply say, "Alexa, open Spot The Match."
Look Carefully: Alexa will show you two different cards from a randomized deck.
Find the Common Element: Your task is to quickly identify the one icon that is common between the two cards.
Respond Fast: Tap the correct match and a new card will be dealt to find a new match.
Multiple Rounds: The game consists of several rounds - remember, there's only one match per card.
Daily Challenge Leaderboard: There's a new challenge every day, see how you fast you are compared to other users.
Challenge Yourself: Try to beat your own high score, or with premium and a phone engage in multiplayer games.
Features:

Dynamic Content: Each game randomizes the deck, though the daily game is the same for everyone.
Family Friendly: Fun for all ages, perfect for quick family game nights or parties. With premium you can access multiplayer.*
Skill Development: Enhances quick thinking, and your reaction time.

Ready to put your observation skills to the test? Enable Spot The Match now and start the fun!

*Multiplayer requires each user to connect their phone to receive their individual cards and is a premium feature.

Music provided by Zapsplat.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
